page.title: 10A Coventry Community School
page.content: Our school serves the whole community. Everyone can come to learn different subjects and skills, to meet their friends and join in musical & sporting activities. People come to the community lounge for coffee breaks, to meet their friends & the staff. There are meetings for pensioners, a nursery for pre-school children, and classes for womens' self defence, toddlers gym, woodworking, and needlework for the blind. We have a narrow boat called The Kingfisher for holidays on the canals. The Hillfields 'Happening' is our annual carnival which includes our steel band and Asian dancers who hold their competition at our school. One can learn languages such as Urdu, Hindi, Spanish, French or Welsh. Our school is for everyone.
